ItemType.name: Simple fuel rod
ItemType.desc: This basic fuel rod provides 2500 units of energy

ItemType.name: armor repair patch
ItemType.desc: This armor repair patch restores 30 hp to any armor

ItemType.name: Silence charm
ItemType.desc: This charm contains concentrated energy from The Orator. Invoke this charm to release the energy as a destructive burst.

ItemType.name: basic laser cannon
ItemType.desc: This is a cheap laser weapon usually found on combat test dummies.

ItemType.name: Amethyst laser cannon
ItemType.desc: The Amethyst laser cannon (from Apex Melliferrum) is the only laser cannon (made by Apex Melliferrum) that fires a magenta-colored beam. That is the reason why the Amethyst laser cannon is one of the most pricey starter weapons around.

ItemType.name: Beowulf dual laser cannon
ItemType.desc: The Beowulf dual laser cannon allows you to strike with speed.

ItemType.name: Buckler shield
ItemType.desc: Basic shield generator

ItemType.name: Shimmer shield
ItemType.desc: Basic shield generator

ItemType.name: Klaw missile
ItemType.desc: A Klaw missile seeks its target somewhat aggressively.

ItemType.name: Klaw missile launcher
ItemType.desc: The Klaw missile launcher fires two quick tracking missiles at a time.

ItemType.name: Musket turret
ItemType.desc: This lightweight kinetic gun is mounted on an omnidirectional turret for automatic aiming. Like any other disposable weapon, it has limited ammo and easy installation.

ItemType.name: Anti-missile defender
ItemType.desc: This turret fires lasers at incoming projectiles to destroy them.

ItemType.name: Deployable laser drone
ItemType.desc: Deployable laser drone

ItemType.name: Flintlock mass driver
ItemType.desc: The flintlock mass driver fires a basic kinetic projectile.

ItemType.name: Sabre mass driver
ItemType.desc: The sabre mass driver fires a stronger kinetic projectile.

ItemType.name: Gemsteel plate
ItemType.desc: This semicrystalline armor maintains its aesthetic beauty at all damage levels, but it can be quite brittle. The fact that gemsteel glows bright violet when exposed to light is one reason why it is not recommended for stealth fighters.

ItemType.name: Knightscale plate
ItemType.desc: This strong armor is made for the Knight series of gunships.

ItemType.name: Bumpersteel Plate
ItemType.desc: This hardy armor is the main choice of plating for the Wagon-class.

ItemType.name: Dynamite charge
ItemType.desc: This cheap explosive is capable of blowing apart a civilian starship (with some difficulty).

ItemType.name: Dynamite cannon
ItemType.desc: This civilian-grade bomb launcher packs a small but powerful explosion. It requires Dynamite charges. Time and technology have not made it any less unwieldy as a weapon.

ItemType.name: IntelliGun 1.0
ItemType.desc: The IntelliGun fires tracking kinetic rounds.

ItemType.name: Amethyst warranty card
ItemType.desc: This card provides proof of limited warranty for your Amethyst-class yacht. Present at any licensed ApexMelliferrum location to receive a discount on maintenance services.

ItemType.name: SHIELDBASH program
ItemType.desc: This one-time program attempts to kill the shields on your selected target.
